Key Match Events: The Mavericks outscored the Magic 30-9 in the first 9:30 of the second quarter
The Mavericks outscored the Magic 13-2 in the final 3:10 of the first quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Orlando played its second game without Paolo Banchero, the No. 1 overall pick in the 2022 draft and 2023 Rookie of the Year, who suffered a torn right oblique last Wednesday
Post-Match Reflections: Dallas outscored Orlando 19-12 in fast-break points and finished with a season-high 53 rebounds
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic scored well below its average of 111.7 points per game
The Magic were a season-worst 19.5% on 3-pointers (8 of 41)
Others: Daniel Gafford scored a season-high 18 points
Dereck Lively II had 11 points and 11 rebounds off Dallas' bench
